name: Appstarting
overview:
Appstarting is the business web-based application store where entrepreneurs can find the best resources between tons of internet information. The mission is to be an online platform like itunes to catapult companies and services.

Basically appstarting offers the infrastructure and the platform to catapult applications, which will help them to monetize their work reaching their ideal audience. They help connect offers with demands as a marketplace like itunes. Actually, Vidneur is going to be the itunes focused of Business.

Their business model is the affiliate marketing, work with companies related to the sector by referring customers and earning for actions like a purchase (CPA) with residual earnings. The publication for these companies is free.

For those companies that donâ€™t work with that system. Vidneur has a limited time initial paid membership for just $47 usd/month with benefits like videos, screenshots and reviews.

Felipe Mendoza is the CEO and Director of appstarting. Mauricio is the co-founder and the CTO.

Felipe allways thought in create Internet business and now he is the Partner with Mauricio Vanegas. Vidneur is based on Medellin, Colombia. “The next Silicon Valley” as they said.
